entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
